action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the table, the book on the table and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> open refrigerator
Next actions: take plate, go to kitchen
Turn 1
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a peach, a sandwich, a banana, a orange and a apple.

> take plate
Next actions: since there is no plate in the refrigerator, I will go to the kitchen to find the plate, and then look for the book and the pillow.
Turn 2
You can't see a plate here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: look for the plate, and then search for the book and the pillow to eventually put them on the table along with the plate.
Turn 3
You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a counter and a cupboard. The plate is on the counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room and a pantry here.

> take plate
Next actions: go to living room to find the book and the pillow, and then put all three items on the table.
Turn 4
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.

> go to living room
Next actions: look for the book and the pillow, take them if possible, and then put all three items on the table.
Turn 5
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a chair, a book, a side table, a table and a couch. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.

> take book
Next actions: take pillow if found, then put the plate, book, and pillow on the table.
Turn 6
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a plate.

> go to hallway
Next actions: search for the pillow, take it, and then return to the living room to put the plate, book, and pillow on the table.
Turn 7
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: search for the pillow, take it, and then return to the living room to put the plate, book, and pillow on the table.
Turn 8
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a pillow and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take pillow
Next actions: since my inventory is full, I will have to drop or put down one of the items I'm currently holding, then put the plate, book, and pillow on the table in the living room.
Turn 9
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> drop book
Next actions: take pillow, then go to living room and put the plate and pillow on the table, finally go back to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 10
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.

> put book on bed
Next actions: take pillow, go to living room, put the plate and pillow on the table, then go back to bedroom to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 11
You put the book on the bed.

> take pillow
Next actions: go to living room, put the plate and pillow on the table, then go back to bedroom to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 12
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow and a plate.

> go to living room
Next actions: put the plate and pillow on the table, then go back to bedroom to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 13
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to living room from the hallway, put the plate and pillow on the table, then go back to bedroom to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 14
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to living room
Next actions: put the plate and pillow on the table, then go back to bedroom to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 15
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a chair, a side table, a table and a couch. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.

> put plate on table
Next actions: put pillow on table, then go back to bedroom to pick up the book and put it on the table.
Turn 16
You put the plate on the table.

> put pillow on table
Next actions: go to bedroom to pick up the book, then come back to the living room and put the book on the table to complete the goal.
Turn 17
You put the pillow on the table.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to bedroom, take the book, go back to living room, put the book on the table, then type "> done" to end the game.
Turn 18
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: take the book, go back to living room, put the book on the table, then type "> done" to end the game.
Turn 19
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a book and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. The book is on the bed. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take book
Next actions: go to living room, put the book on the table, then type "> done" to end the game.
Turn 20
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to living room, put the book on the table, then type "> done" to end the game.
Turn 21
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet and a living room here.

> go to living room
Next actions: put the book on the table, then type "> done" to end the game.
Turn 22

You are in a living room now. There are a plate, a shelf, a chair, a side table, a pillow, a table and a couch. The plate is on the table. The pillow is on the table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.

> put book on table
Next actions: type "> done" to end the game.
